jokes.joke:
The T-Rex Problem

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
T-Rex.
T-Rex who?
T-Rex your door because my tiny arms can't knock properly!

The Chicken Detective

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Chicken.
Chicken who?
Chicken to see if you've finally answered why I crossed the road!

The Ghost Dilemma

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Boo.
Boo who?
Don't cry, it's just Casper. But, um, could I borrow a sheet? Mine's at the cleaners.

The Pirate's Request

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Arrr.
Arrr who?
Arrr you gonna open the door, or do I need to use me hook?

The Sandwich Mystery

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Lettuce.
Lettuce who?
Lettuce in; I've got mayo, and this sandwich isn't going to make itself!

The Giraffe's Excuse

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Giraffe.
Giraffe who?
Giraffe your coat because it's a tall order getting me in through this door!

The Comedy Coach

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Coach.
Coach who?
Coach up on your jokes; this one's hilarious if you think about it!

The Time Traveler's Error

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Future.
Future who?
Future self says you should've opened this door five minutes ago!

The Banana Thief

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Banana.
Banana who?
Banana your business, but if you've got any ripe ones, I'm taking them!

The Secret Agent's Knock

Knock, knock.
Who's there?
Bond.
Bond who?
Bond... James Bond. Now let me in before this gets awkward.
